Was really pleased with this view so had to take a screenshot, my rover on the Mun with Kerbal and the Sun in the background all perfectly lined up, views like this just add that extra level of awesome to this game ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Looks beautiful with the Sun in th background!
